snippet: The planned center, which will work on smartphone development, is the latest move in the Chinese telecommunications company's rapid expansion into Europe.
abstract: Huawei Technologies plans to open research and development center in Helsinki in 2013; planned center, which will work on smartphone development, is the latest move in the Chinese telecommunications company's rapid expansion into Europe.
lead_paragraph: The planned center, which will work on smartphone development, is the latest move in the Chinese telecommunications company's rapid expansion into Europe.

headline.main: Huawei to Open Research Center in Finland
headline.print_headline: Chinese Firm Unveils Plans For an Office In Finland
